main event: A UFO was sighted in Hartland, Maine on April 6, 1954, lasting approximately 10-15 minutes, moving erratically, making no sound, and disappearing straight up at high speed.
interesting points: The object did not exhibit any typical characteristics of conventional aircraft.
The sighting occurred at 23:10 hours (EST) and remained in view for approximately 10-15 minutes.
Relative speed estimated at 2000 knots, with a closing speed of 6-9 thousand feet per second.
An investigation was scheduled but lasted only 30 minutes.
